name: hotkeys
description: The future of shortcut management is here.

scripts.build:prod: npm run build:dev && NODE_ENV=production webpack -p --progress --config webpack.config.js && npm run update:playground
scripts.build:dev: npm run clear:dist && NODE_ENV=development webpack --progress --config webpack.config.js && npm run update:playground
scripts.build:watch: npm run clear:dist && NODE_ENV=development webpack  --watch --progress --config webpack.config.js && npm run update:playground

author: Bargas and Dani
